review: Amazon has done a great job at making this easy to set up and easy to use. Set-up was amazingly easy! Then it came to actually using it. The display is excellent. The layout is intuitive - I was able to navigate to what I wanted to see without having to read any instructions. The thumbnails for movies are nice and large, and it's easy to read the descriptions from a distance away (unlike my smart TV in another room).Then I tried the voice search. Very impressive! I spoke the name of a movie I wanted to go to, and the link immediately appeared on the screen. One click and I had my movie.I've had my Amazon Fire TV for about two months and am completely impressed. Nothing else I've used compares. My next "toy" from Amazon will be the Amazon Echo. Mine is scheduled to be delivered in ten days. Can't wait!!!!
